# iru_device_action_unlock_account (Action)

Unlocks a specific user account on a device. Available for Mac.

## Example Usage

```terraform
action "iru_device_action_unlock_account" "example" {
  device_id = "8a9f88d9-e7f4-47e6-9326-fd4b39534c4e"
  username  = "localadmin"
}
```

<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `device_id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.
- `username` (String) The local username to unlock.
